original_text: Then the Lord God said to Moses, “Remove your shoes from your feet, because you are standing in a very special place. This is my own place.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 네 발의 신을 벗으라 네가 서 있는 곳은 거룩한 땅이니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord God said to Moses
Remove your shoes from your feet
because you are standing in a very special place
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 매우 특별한 곳에 서 있기 때문이다
